column4: hi a friend of mine is trying to install ubuntu 10.4 .. and when he run "demonstration and bla bla" to see what ubuntu looks like.. he got "logon screen" and no matter what he write.. he said "login failed"
does anyone know why when run livecd of ubuntu 10.4 a friend of mine got the login screen and no matter what he write - login failed ?
did you md5 test the iso you used?
no... i dont even know what that is
and what if this md5 is ok ? i mean.. why is this needed at first place?
so you know the data you are using is complete and consistant
so.. basically .. there should be no logon screen when you run ubuntu "demonstration and install" ?
usually yes, If you restart the x server using the key shortcut, does it autologin
i believe the credentials are: username=ubuntu password=ubuntu
nope.. username - ubuntu 0 password - ubuntu .. is not working
try username ubuntu with no password
weird, well the username is ubuntu. I know that for sure
when i write ubuntu with no pass.. the screen changes for a second and then.. again the login screen
